favorites.creator: George Lucas
favorites.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
favorites.description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

favorites.creator: Peter Jackson
favorites.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
favorites.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

favorites.creator: Christopher Nolan
favorites.title: Inception
favorites.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

favorites.creator: Martin Scorsese
favorites.title: Shutter Island
favorites.description: Two US marshals are sent to a mental institution on an inhospitable island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient.

favorites.creator: Ridley Scott
favorites.title: Alien
favorites.description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

favorites.creator: Spike Jonze
favorites.title: her
favorites.description: In the near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

favorites.creator: Alex Garland
favorites.title: Ex Machina
favorites.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

favorites.creator: René Goscinny, Jean-Jacques Sempé
favorites.title: Le Petit Nicolas
favorites.description: The books are told from the point of view of Nicolas himself, which gives the book a distinct and personal sense of humour. The narration is a pastiche of childish storytelling, with run-on sentences and schoolyard slang used in abundance, and much of the humour derives from Nicolas’s misunderstanding of adults' behaviour.

favorites.creator: H.P. Lovecraft
favorites.title: The Dunwich Horror
favorites.description: In the story, members of the Whateley family try to summon the extraterrestrial Old Ones to their small village in Massachusetts. The novella is considered to be one of the foundational works of the Lovecraft mythology.

favorites.creator: Gabriel García Márquez
favorites.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
favorites.description: One Hundred Years of Solitude is the history of the isolated town of Macondo and of the family who founds it, the Buendías. For years, the town has no contact with the outside world, except for gypsies who occasionally visit, peddling technologies like ice and telescopes.
